description.translate: Make the earth tremble and bring panic and distress with you.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Patte de la bête\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Fait trembler la terre et apporte\"}","{\"text\":\"§7la panique et la détresse avec toi.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Make the earth tremble and bring\"}","{\"text\":\"§7panic and distress with you.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HUN§a1 §7RES§c-1\"}"]}}
